TopicTitle: I need help understanding that report crash

Articles.Content:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/n4c2fn87gr2imtg/output_log.txt?dl=0

I have no idea what exactly is causing the crash, I recently added two mods and played for a while before I started crashing. I unistalled those two mods and the game keeps crashing.

So what is causing the crash and do you have any Read a Crash Log 101 tips?

Thank you.

If you run a search through the log for the word "exception" you'll turn up any and all major errors. There aren't a whole lot in that log, but it can't hurt checking the mod threads to see if there are any updates available, and/or just temporarily removing the mods they refer to to see if the issue clears up any.

That particular kind of crash leaves us with very little information as to why it happened, but a potential avenue to explore would be to look at the last normal thing the game logged before it crashed (which was [VersionTaggedType] found KSPAPIExtensions.UIPartActionResourceEditorImproved_1_7_0_0 for KSPAPIExtensions.UIPartActionResourceEditorImproved ) and temporarily removing the mod it references. In this case, that would be TweakScale, and Procedural Fairings. Sometimes you'll have to grab the keyword it gives you (KSPAPIExtensions, in this case) and run a search through the log for that in order to figure out which mod folder it's in. That information will be near the start of the log, in the loading sequence.
Thank you for that explanation. It really helps, because I never knew what to look for. I had tweakscale bundled with another mod and I believe it was outdated, I'll check it out.
